SELECT palt_doc_seq ,intg_bl_seq ,palt_trdp_cd ,(SELECT cd_nm FROM TB_COM_CD_DTL WHERE com_cd = 'C027' AND cd_val = palt_doc_tp_cd) AS palt_doc_tp_nm ,palt_trdp_pic_nm ,palt_trdp_pic_fax ,palt_trdp_pic_phn ,tmplt_seq ,palt_doc_tp_cd ,palt_doc_nm ,palt_doc_no ,palt_doc_img_url ,palt_doc_img_nm ,palt_doc_pdf_url ,palt_doc_pdf_nm ,palt_doc_msg ,palt_doc_rmk ,iss_dt ,rgst_usrid ,rgst_ofc_cd ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), rgst_tms, 112) AS rgst_tms ,modi_usrid ,modi_ofc_cd ,modi_tms ,delt_flg ,ISNULL(palt_ext_flg, 'N') AS palt_ext_flg FROM TB_PALT_SHP_DOC
WHERE 1=1 AND intg_bl_seq = #intg_bl_seq#
AND palt_mnu_cd = ''
AND palt_mnu_cd = #palt_mnu_cd#
ORDER BY palt_doc_seq DESC
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE TB_PALT_SHP_DOC WHERE intg_bl_seq = #intg_bl_seq#
AND palt_mnu_cd = ''
AND palt_mnu_cd = #palt_mnu_cd#
AND palt_doc_seq = #palt_doc_seq#
